mapper.sql: ID, LOGIN_NAME, MOBILE, PASSWORD, SUPPLIER_NAME, WEBSITE, FOUND_DATE, BUSINESS_TYPE, ADDRESS, BANK_NAME, BANK_ACCOUNT, POST_CODE, TAX_CERT, BILL_CERT, SECURITY_CERT, BREACH_CERT, LEGAL_NAME, LEGAL_ID_CARD, LEGAL_TELEPHONE, LEGAL_MOBILE, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_TELEPHONE, CONTACT_FAX, CONTACT_MOBILE, CONTACT_EMAIL, CONTACT_ADDRESS, CREDIT_CODE, REGIST_AUTHORITY, REGIST_FUND, BUSINESS_START_DATE, BUSINESS_END_DATE, BUSINESS_SCOPE, BUSINESS_ADDRESS, BUSINESS_POST_CODE, OVERSEAS_BRANCH, BRANCH_COUNTRY, BRANCH_ADDRESS, BRANCH_NAME, BRANCH_BUSINESS_SCOPE, SUPPLIER_TYPE_ID, SUPPLIER_STATUS, PROCUREMENT_DEP_ID, SUPPLIER_LEVEL, SUPPLIER_PLEDGE, SUPPLIER_REG_LIST, SUPPLIER_EXTRACTS_LIST, SUPPLIER_INSPECT_LIST, SUPPLIER_REVIEW_LIST, SUPPLIER_CHANGE_LIST, SUPPLIER_EXIT_LIST, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT,SUBMIT_AT, BUSINESS_CERT,DETAIL_ADDRESS,ARMY_BUSINESS_NAME,ARMY_BUSINESS_FAX,ARMY_BUSINESS_MOBILE, ARMY_BUSINESS_TELEPHONE,ARMY_BUSINESS_EMAIL,AUDIT_DATE,ARMY_BUSINESS_ADDRESS,CONCAT_PROVINCE,CONCAT_CITY,ARMY_BUSINESS_PROVINCE, ARMY_BUSINESS_CITY,IS_PROVISIONAL,DESCRIPTION,LEVEL_SCORE_PRODUCT,LEVEL_SCORE_SALES,LEVEL_SCORE_SERVICE,IS_ILLEGAL,PURCHASE_EXPERIENCE, IS_HAVING_CON_CERT, BUSINESS_NATURE, IS_PUBLISH
mapper.select:
select
from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER

select
from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT T2.* FROM ( SELECT SUPPLIER_ID FROM "T_BSS_PPMS_SALE_TENDER" where PROJECT_ID =#{projectId} GROUP BY SUPPLIER_ID) T1 LEFT JOIN T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER T2 ON T2.ID =T1.SUPPLIER_ID
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER (ID, LOGIN_NAME, MOBILE, PASSWORD, SUPPLIER_NAME, WEBSITE, FOUND_DATE, BUSINESS_TYPE, ADDRESS, BANK_NAME, BANK_ACCOUNT, POST_CODE, TAX_CERT, BILL_CERT, SECURITY_CERT, BREACH_CERT, LEGAL_NAME, LEGAL_ID_CARD, LEGAL_TELEPHONE, LEGAL_MOBILE, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_TELEPHONE, CONTACT_FAX, CONTACT_MOBILE, CONTACT_EMAIL, CONTACT_ADDRESS, CREDIT_CODE, REGIST_AUTHORITY, REGIST_FUND, BUSINESS_START_DATE, BUSINESS_END_DATE, BUSINESS_SCOPE, BUSINESS_ADDRESS, BUSINESS_POST_CODE, OVERSEAS_BRANCH, BRANCH_COUNTRY, BRANCH_ADDRESS, BRANCH_NAME, BRANCH_BUSINESS_SCOPE, SUPPLIER_TYPE_ID, SUPPLIER_STATUS, PROCUREMENT_DEP_ID, SUPPLIER_LEVEL, SUPPLIER_PLEDGE, SUPPLIER_REG_LIST, SUPPLIER_EXTRACTS_LIST, SUPPLIER_INSPECT_LIST, SUPPLIER_REVIEW_LIST, SUPPLIER_CHANGE_LIST, SUPPLIER_EXIT_LIST, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, SCORE, BUSINESS_CERT ) values (#{id}, #{loginName}, #{mobile}, #{password}, #{supplierName}, #{website}, #{foundDate}, #{businessType}, #{address}, #{bankName}, #{bankAccount}, #{postCode}, #{taxCert}, #{billCert}, #{securityCert}, #{breachCert}, #{legalName}, #{legalIdCard}, #{legalTelephone}, #{legalMobile}, #{contactName}, #{contactTelephone}, #{contactFax}, #{contactMobile}, #{contactEmail}, #{contactAddress}, #{creditCode}, #{registAuthority}, #{registFund}, #{businessStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{businessEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{businessScope}, #{businessAddress}, #{businessPostCode}, #{overseasBranch}, #{branchCountry}, #{branchAddress}, #{branchName}, #{branchBusinessScope}, #{supplierTypeId}, #{status}, #{procurementDepId}, #{supplierLevel}, #{supplierPledge}, #{supplierRegList}, #{supplierExtractsList}, #{supplierInspectList}, #{supplierReviewList}, #{supplierChangeList}, #{supplierExitList}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{score}, #{businessCert} )

mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName},
IS_HAVING_CON_CERT = #{isHavingConCert},
BUSINESS_NATURE = #{businessNature},
LEVEL_SCORE_PRODUCT = #{levelScoreProduct},
LEVEL_SCORE_SALES = #{levelScoreSales},
LEVEL_SCORE_SERVICE = #{levelScoreService},
DESCRIPTION = #{description},
IS_ILLEGAL = #{isIllegal},
PURCHASE_EXPERIENCE = #{purchaseExperience},
MOBILE = #{mobile},
PASSWORD = #{password},
SUPPLIER_NAME = #{supplierName},
WEBSITE = #{website},
FOUND_DATE = #{foundDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BUSINESS_TYPE = #{businessType},
ADDRESS = #{address},
BANK_NAME = #{bankName},
BANK_ACCOUNT = #{bankAccount},
POST_CODE = #{postCode},
TAX_CERT = #{taxCert},
BILL_CERT = #{billCert},
SECURITY_CERT = #{securityCert},
BREACH_CERT = #{breachCert},
LEGAL_NAME = #{legalName},
LEGAL_ID_CARD = #{legalIdCard},
LEGAL_TELEPHONE = #{legalTelephone},
LEGAL_MOBILE = #{legalMobile},
CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName},
CONTACT_TELEPHONE = #{contactTelephone},
CONTACT_FAX = #{contactFax},
CONTACT_MOBILE = #{contactMobile},
CONTACT_EMAIL = #{contactEmail},
CONTACT_ADDRESS = #{contactAddress},
CREDIT_CODE = #{creditCode},
REGIST_AUTHORITY = #{registAuthority},
REGIST_FUND = #{registFund},
BUSINESS_START_DATE = #{businessStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BUSINESS_START_DATE ='',
BUSINESS_END_DATE = #{businessEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BUSINESS_SCOPE = #{businessScope},
BUSINESS_ADDRESS = #{businessAddress},
BUSINESS_POST_CODE = #{businessPostCode},
OVERSEAS_BRANCH = #{overseasBranch},
BRANCH_COUNTRY = #{branchCountry},
BRANCH_ADDRESS = #{branchAddress},
BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName},
BRANCH_BUSINESS_SCOPE = #{branchBusinessScope},
SUPPLIER_TYPE_ID = #{supplierTypeId},
PROCUREMENT_DEP_ID = #{procurementDepId},
SUPPLIER_LEVEL = #{supplierLevel},
SUPPLIER_PLEDGE = #{supplierPledge},
SUPPLIER_REG_LIST = #{supplierRegList},
SUPPLIER_EXTRACTS_LIST = #{supplierExtractsList},
SUPPLIER_INSPECT_LIST = #{supplierInspectList},
SUPPLIER_REVIEW_LIST = #{supplierReviewList},
SUPPLIER_CHANGE_LIST = #{supplierChangeList},
SUPPLIER_EXIT_LIST = #{supplierExitList},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUBMIT_AT = #{submitAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BUSINESS_CERT = #{businessCert},
SUPPLIER_STATUS = #{status},
DETAIL_ADDRESS=#{detailAddress},
ARMY_BUSINESS_NAME=#{armyBusinessName},
ARMY_BUSINESS_FAX=#{armyBusinessFax},
ARMY_BUSINESS_MOBILE=#{armyBuinessMobile},
ARMY_BUSINESS_TELEPHONE=#{armyBuinessTelephone},
ARMY_BUSINESS_EMAIL=#{armyBuinessEmail},
ARMY_BUSINESS_ADDRESS=#{armyBuinessAddress},
AUDIT_DATE=#{auditDate},
CONCAT_PROVINCE=#{concatProvince},
CONCAT_CITY=#{concatCity},
ARMY_BUSINESS_PROVINCE=#{armyBuinessProvince},
ARMY_BUSINESS_CITY=#{armyBuinessCity},
where ID = #{id}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER set LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName}, MOBILE = #{mobile}, PASSWORD = #{password}, SUPPLIER_NAME = #{supplierName}, WEBSITE = #{website}, FOUND_DATE = #{foundDate}, BUSINESS_TYPE = #{businessType}, ADDRESS = #{address}, BANK_NAME = #{bankName}, BANK_ACCOUNT = #{bankAccount}, POST_CODE = #{postCode}, TAX_CERT = #{taxCert}, BILL_CERT = #{billCert}, SECURITY_CERT = #{securityCert}, BREACH_CERT = #{breachCert}, LEGAL_NAME = #{legalName}, LEGAL_ID_CARD = #{legalIdCard}, LEGAL_TELEPHONE = #{legalTelephone}, LEGAL_MOBILE = #{legalMobile}, CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName}, CONTACT_TELEPHONE = #{contactTelephone}, CONTACT_FAX = #{contactFax}, CONTACT_MOBILE = #{contactMobile}, CONTACT_EMAIL = #{contactEmail}, CONTACT_ADDRESS = #{contactAddress}, CREDIT_CODE = #{creditCode}, REGIST_AUTHORITY = #{registAuthority}, REGIST_FUND = #{registFund}, BUSINESS_START_DATE = #{businessStartDate}, BUSINESS_END_DATE = #{businessEndDate}, BUSINESS_SCOPE = #{businessScope}, BUSINESS_ADDRESS = #{businessAddress}, BUSINESS_POST_CODE = #{businessPostCode}, OVERSEAS_BRANCH = #{overseasBranch}, BRANCH_COUNTRY = #{branchCountry}, BRANCH_ADDRESS = #{branchAddress}, BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}, BRANCH_BUSINESS_SCOPE = #{branchBusinessScope}, SUPPLIER_TYPE_ID = #{supplierTypeId}, SUPPLIER_STATUS = #{status}, PROCUREMENT_DEP_ID = #{procurementDepId}, SUPPLIER_LEVEL = #{supplierLevel}, SUPPLIER_PLEDGE = #{supplierPledge}, SUPPLIER_REG_LIST = #{supplierRegList}, SUPPLIER_EXTRACTS_LIST = #{supplierExtractsList}, SUPPLIER_INSPECT_LIST = #{supplierInspectList}, SUPPLIER_REVIEW_LIST = #{supplierReviewList}, SUPPLIER_CHANGE_LIST = #{supplierChangeList}, SUPPLIER_EXIT_LIST = #{supplierExitList}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BUSINESS_CERT = #{businessCert}, DETAIL_ADDRESS=#{detailAddress} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select ID from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER t1 where t1.rowid = (select max(rowid) from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER t2)
select * from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER where ID = #{id}

sql.if: and (tt1.SUPPLIER_STATUS = 0 or tt1.SUPPLIER_STATUS = 1 or tt1.SUPPLIER_STATUS = 2 or tt1.SUPPLIER_STATUS = 3)

mapper.select: select count(*) from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER tt1 where 1=1

select * from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER tt1 where IS_PROVISIONAL = 0
order by SCORE DESC
mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER
SUPPLIER_STATUS = #{status},
AUDIT_DATE=#{auditDate},
UPDATED_AT=#{updatedAt},
IS_PUBLISH=#{isPublish},
where ID = #{id}
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER set SCORE = #{score} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select t1.LOGIN_NAME from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER t1
SELECT ss.* FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_EXT_RELATE er INNER JOIN T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER ss ON er.SUPPLIER_ID = SS."ID" WHERE ER.STATUS_COUNT = 0 AND ER.OPERATING_TYPE = 1 AND ER.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}

select
from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER where LOGIN_NAME = #{name}
SELECT count(1) FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE MOBILE= #{mobile}

SELECT
FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE SUPPLIER_STATUS = 0 AND SUBMIT_AT >= to_date(#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND SUBMIT_AT <= to_date(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT
FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE SUPPLIER_STATUS = 0
AND UPDATED_AT >= to_date(#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND UPDATED_AT <= to_date(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT
FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE CREDIT_CODE = #{_parameter} and SUPPLIER_STATUS != 6

SELECT
FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE SUPPLIER_STATUS in(1,5,7)
SELECT min(FOUND_DATE) FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER
SELECT LEVEL_SCORE_PRODUCT FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE LEVEL_SCORE_PRODUCT is not null ORDER BY LEVEL_SCORE_PRODUCT ASC
SELECT LEVEL_SCORE_SALES FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE LEVEL_SCORE_SALES is not null ORDER BY LEVEL_SCORE_SALES ASC
SELECT LEVEL_SCORE_SERVICE FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE LEVEL_SCORE_SERVICE is not null ORDER BY LEVEL_SCORE_SERVICE ASC

SELECT
FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE SUPPLIER_STATUS = 1 AND IS_PROVISIONAL = 0

SELECT
FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE (SUPPLIER_STATUS = -1 or SUPPLIER_STATUS = 0 or SUPPLIER_STATUS = 2)
AND SUPPLIER_NAME like '%${supplierName}%'
AND SUPPLIER_NAME like '%${supplierName}%'
AND LOGIN_NAME like '%${loginName}%'
AND MOBILE like '%${mobile}%'
AND SUPPLIER_STATUS = #{status}
